INDEX.TITLE: WHB – IA Cosmetics

LEFT_PANEL.TITLE_START: How do you want to start?
LEFT_PANEL.INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Take a selfie or upload a photo.
2. The AI analyzes your skin and highlights areas for improvement.
3. Test each cream with the half-face comparator.
LEFT_PANEL.INITIAL_SUBMESSAGE:
To start the AI analysis, press "Selfie Mode" or upload your image.
Here you will see the **6 key metrics** of your skin.
